website_summaries.verdict: A cleanser that gives a really clean feel, without the harsh stripping quality of regular soaps.
pros: A hypo-allergenic formula without scent, oil, silicone or alcohol, the refreshing foaming action of this cleanser gives it a luxurious feel
It gently removes oils without leaving the skin overly dry
cons: It’s best used in conjunction with a Clinique toner and moisturizer

customer_reviews.title: Questioning authenticity from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll by from Clinique direct. I seriously question if this product is authentic from this seller, as it does not have the "certified yellow sticker" that Clinique uses when a product is purchased. I have been using this soap over the last 12-15 years (purchased from a Clinique counter) and the one from this seller has a distinct smell (which none of the previous ones I purchase from Clinique has any noticeable smell at all). And my face seems to be breaking out with the product from this seller as well, and I've never had this problem in the past either. This product when authentic is awesome, I advise buying direct from Clinique online/counter.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bynum-wynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks take & smells weird
customer_reviews.text: Could this be fake or I’m I tripping? The smell on it is strong. The bottle looks fake!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived on time BUT
customer_reviews.text: I opened my package and it was wet inside. When I tried to removed it, the top came off the bottle. There was no cover on the bottle, but I’m not sure there is suppose to be one. I’m retuning it and will order another one because I love Clinique products. I’ll try again.
customer_reviews.author: lovestoread

customer_reviews.title: Great unscented facial cleanser for sensitive skin types
customer_reviews.text: I like that this facial cleanser is easy on the skin but cleans well. There is no scent which I also like because scented cleansers tend to irratate my skin. The only complaint I have is that the bottle dispenser it comes in doesn't allow you to get the last little 1/4 of cleanser out of the bottle. I always have to take the lid off and try to get the remainder out by putting the dispenser upside down. Overall great product for any face/skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Mmagirl

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but the packaging was horrible. It was in a plastic bag rolling around in a large space. It had leaked into the bag and was getting out of the bag. The lid had unscrewed itself slightly.
customer_reviews.author: SeniorSewist

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clinique face wash for years. One bottle lasts my husband and I around 6 months which makes the price definitely worth it. I love how clean i feel after using it! I love buying it on amazon because it seems like the price is often dropped lower than what department stores sell it for. It does pretty good at getting my makeup off except for my gel eyeliner (which nothing can get off except my marykay eye makeup remover).
customer_reviews.author: Zaneta

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily and have almost no acne.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time and it keeps my skin as clear as I've ever seen it. The bottle was bent just enough to stop me from being able to use the pump, but the face wash inside is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Good product!! It suits for dry skin texture
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! I am using since 2014. It suits my skin tone. I have dry skin. Good product for those who are looking for smooth and not so oily after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Yadavi Kankanwadi

customer_reviews.title: Wow...just wow
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't see myself ever going back to using plain soap to wash my face. This is a must have for makeup lovers like myself. Having been a fan of white towels it excites me to wipe my face after a steamy shower and see absolutely NOTHING not a drop of foundation dirty my towels!!! Love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Imani S

customer_reviews.title: Great product, slight damage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, the best face wash I have ever used. This was my first time ordering online and the pump is broken. I am unable to use the pump which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Clinique Liquid Facial Mild 6F37 Soap, 6.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: Contains all benefits of Clinique famous facial soap. Provides gentle cleansing without stripping. Thoroughly removes dirt, impurities and excess oil. Leaves skin feeling clean and fresh.
feature_bullets: The package weight of the product is 6.7 ounces
The package dimension of the product is 5"L x 9"W x 7"H
